column1: '''Deeping-road''' was a short road which diverged from the main horse-road (the [[Great Road]]) to the north from [[Helm's Deep]] and led from there to the [[Deeping-coomb]] and [[Hornburg]].<ref>{{UT
column2: 11}}</ref> The road is marked in the general map of ''The Lord of the Rings'' as a short stretch from north-east to south-west but without name.<ref>{{FR
